description:
My school life is colorful. Now,I will tell you something interesting about my school life.
   My school life is busy! I have four classes in the morning and three classes in the afternoon each day from Monday to Friday and forty minutes each..Classes begin at 8:10 a.m. We have to get to school before 7:30 because we have a morning class.I usually have lunch at school, then, I have a rest. After school, I often climb hills with my classmates on the playground. It,’s my favorite outdoor activities I like it very much! What do you think?
   The courses I learn in school are Chinese, mathematics, English, geography, sports and so on. My favorite subject is math, because it ’s easy and interesting! Do you like math，can you tell me?I like English too because it’s very interesting .Our English teacher is Miss Li. He speaks English well. He is very kind to us. My classmates love him very much. We like to play football with him after class. We read English every morning. We say "Hello!" and "See you later!" to all the teachers in our school in English. Other teachers say "Good morning." and "Sit down, please." to us in English, too. We are all glad to hear that. 
   Apart from the classes, there are many activities in the school. I am active in my school life.After class I often play ball games with my classmates and they are all friendly to me. I also like swimming and drawing . These activities enrich my life. I made many new friends with the same hobbies, we are getting along well and helping each other to improve.
   In the sixth year of my primary school, I joined in a volunteer club. The mission of club is to help those people in need. The first activity I participated was to hold the charity sale to collect the money and donation, then bring them to a primary school into deep mountains. The sales was successful as most of the students supported this charity and donated the money and study materials with kindness. On the weekend we brought all the donations to the primary school, we saw the smile on children’ face, and also saw their poor study condition. I felt myself a heavy responsibility to make the change of it. Since then, I would volunteer to be an English teacher in that school every summer vacation, I also encouraged my friends to do something for those children.
   My school life is wonderful,isn't it?

title: 小学英语演讲稿：校园生活
